review.title: The Causality/Repair Connection in Databases: Causality-Programs
review.abstract: In this work, answer-set programs that specify repairs of databases are used as a basis for solving computational and reasoning problems about causes for query answers from databases.
histories: To appear in Proc. SUM'17 as short paper, 7-pages
